fields_of_interest: Research and innovation, Digital economy and society, Transport
eu_initiatives: We inform and advise DG MOVE on technical, business and societal trends and developments related to traffic and travel information.
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
relevant_communication: TISA is following the ITS Directive Delegated Act, specifically priority Action A, B and C, and publishing position papers related to these priority actions and other matters to traffic and traveller information.
goals__remit: TISA is a market-driven membership association with worldwide scope, established as a non-profit company focussed on proactive implementation of traffic and travel information services and products based on existing standards, including primarily RDS-TMC and TPEG technologies.
